vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμπνίγω [ῑ],
press closely, of crowds, τινα [NT]; σ. τὸ σπέρμα choke it, [NT]:—passive, δένδρα συμπνιγόμενα [Refs 4th c.BC+]; οἱ ἄνθρακες συμπνίγονται are damped down, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 in passive, to be drowned, of the Gadarene swine, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to choke; to crush
to throttle, choke;, troponym to choke the growth or increase of seed or plants, Mt. 13:22; Mk. 4:7, 19; Lk. 8:14; to press upon, crowd, crush Lk. 8:42*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 抑制 (某樣東西的成長)
2) (誇張語氣用法) 排擠, 擠壓 (路 8:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 抑制 (某样东西的成长)
2) (夸张语气用法) 排挤, 挤压 (路 8:42)
